00027 static bool isNonCpp(char c){ 
00028   bool retVal=false;
00029   switch(c){
00030   case '-': case '/':
00031     retVal=true;
00032     break;
00033   default:
00034     retVal=false;
00035   }
00036   return retVal;
00037 }

00039 ExportPulse::ExportPulse(modules::options* opts):
00040    FillHistBase("ExportPulse",opts),fGuidanceShown(false),
00041         fSetup(NULL),fOptions(opts)
00042         {

00053 int ExportPulse::BeforeFirstEntry(TGlobalData* gData,TSetupData *setup){
00054    fSetup=setup;
00055    if(!fSetup){
00056       cout<<"Error: TSetupData passed to ExportPulse is NULL..."<<endl;
00057       return 1 ;
00058    }
00059    fTotalEvents=*gTotalEntries;
00060 
00062    if(fOptions){
00063        int num=0;
00064        std::vector<std::string> currentList;
00065        std::vector<EventID_t> event_list;
00066        std::vector<TPulseIslandID> pulse_list;
00067        modules::parser::Constructor_t event_pulse_request;
00068        std::string error_type;
00069        // Loop over all options
00070        for(modules::options::OptionsList_t::const_iterator i_opt = fOptions->begin();
00071                 i_opt != fOptions->end(); i_opt++){
00072           // Continue if option is not "all" and not one of the detector names:
00073           if( i_opt->first != "all" && fSetup->GetBankName(i_opt->first)=="") continue;
00074 
00075           // Break the list into items
00076           currentList.clear();
00077           event_list.clear();
00078           pulse_list.clear();
00079           num=fOptions->GetVectorStringsByDelimiter(i_opt->first,currentList);
00080           if(num<=0) continue; // no options were actually specified
00081 
00082           for(std::vector<std::string>::iterator i_request=currentList.begin();
00083                   i_request!=currentList.end();
00084                   i_request++){
00085               event_pulse_request=modules::parser::ParseConstructor(*i_request,'(',')');
00086               // Check things look healthy
00087               if(event_pulse_request.before=="" )error_type="event";
00088               else if( event_pulse_request.inside=="")error_type="pulse";
00089               else if( !ParseEventRequest(event_pulse_request.before, event_list)) error_type="event";
00090               else if( !ParsePulseRequest(event_pulse_request.inside,pulse_list)) error_type="pulse";
00091               if(error_type != ""){
00092                   cout<<"Skipping badly formatted "<<error_type<<" specification: "<<*i_request<<endl;
00093                   cout<<"event="<<event_pulse_request.before<<", pulse="<<event_pulse_request.inside<<endl;
00094                   ShowGuidance();
00095                   continue;
00096               }
00097               // Everything is ok so add this request to the list
00098               for(std::vector<EventID_t>::const_iterator i_event=event_list.begin();
00099                       i_event!=event_list.end();
00100                       i_event++){
00101                  for(std::vector<TPulseIslandID>::const_iterator i_pulse=pulse_list.begin();
00102                         i_pulse!=pulse_list.end(); i_pulse++){
00103                     AddToConfigRequestList(*i_event,i_opt->first,*i_pulse);
00104                  }
00105               }
00106           }
00107 
00108        }
00109    }
00110    return 0;
00111 }

00113 int ExportPulse::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData *gData, TSetupData *gSetup){
00114   // To be corrected once Phill finishes the event navigator
00115   fGlobalData=gData; 
00116   SetCurrentEventNumber(*gEntryNumber);
00117 
00118   // Check if we have any pulses to draw that were requested through the MODULEs file
00119   LoadPulsesRequestedByConfig();
00120 
00121   int ret_val=DrawTPIs();
00122   if(ret_val!=0) return ret_val;
00123 
00124   ret_val=DrawTAPs();
00125   if(ret_val!=0) return ret_val;
00126 
00127   ClearPulsesToExport();
00128   return 0;
00129 }

00131 int ExportPulse::DrawTAPs(){
00132   // Initialise variables that would be used in the loops
00133   const ConstAnalysedPulseList* requestedPulses;
00134 
00135   // Loop over channel that we've been requested to draw a pulse from
00136   for(StringConstAnalPulseMap::const_iterator i_detector=fTAPsToPlot.begin();
00137                   i_detector!=fTAPsToPlot.end();
00138                   i_detector++){
00139      SetCurrentDetectorName(i_detector->first);
00140 
00141      // Get the pulse list for this channel
00142      requestedPulses=&(i_detector->second);
00143 
00144      // Loop over every requested pulse for that channel
00145      for(ConstAnalysedPulseList::const_iterator i_pulse=requestedPulses->begin();
00146                      i_pulse!=requestedPulses->end();
00147                      i_pulse++){
00148 
00149         SetCurrentPulseID((*i_pulse)->GetPulseIslandID());
00150         // Draw the pulse
00151         PlotTAP(*i_pulse);
00152 
00153      }
00154   }
00155   return 0;
00156 }

00159 int ExportPulse::DrawTPIs(){
00160   // Initialise variables that would be used in the loops
00161   TPulseIsland* pulse;
00162   const PulseIDList_t* requestedPulses;
00163   PulseIslandList* pulseList;
00164 
00165   // Loop over channel that we've been requested to draw a pulse from
00166   for(ChannelPulseIDs_t::const_iterator i_detector=fTPIsToPlot.begin();
00167                   i_detector!=fTPIsToPlot.end();
00168                   i_detector++){
00169      SetCurrentDetectorName(i_detector->first);
00170 
00171      // Get the pulse list for this channel
00172      requestedPulses=&(i_detector->second);
00173      pulseList=GetTPIsFromDetector();
00174 
00175      // Loop over every requested pulse for that channel
00176      for(PulseIDList_t::const_iterator i_pulseID=requestedPulses->begin();
00177                      i_pulseID!=requestedPulses->end();
00178                      i_pulseID++){
00179              // Update the pulse info struct
00180              SetCurrentPulseID(*i_pulseID);
00181 
00182         // Get the current requested TPI for this channel
00183         try{
00184                 pulse=pulseList->at(*i_pulseID);
00185         }catch(const std::out_of_range& oor){
00186                 cout<<"Skipping out of range pulse: "<<*i_pulseID<<" on detector '"<<i_detector->first<<endl;
00187                 continue;
00188         }
00189 
00190         // Draw the pulse
00191         PlotTPI(pulse);
00192      }
00193   }
00194   return 0;
00195 }

00197 std::string ExportPulse::PulseInfo_t::MakeTPIName()const{
00198    std::stringstream histname;
00199    histname << "Pulse_" << bankname;
00200    histname << "_" << detname;
00201    histname << "_" << event;
00202    histname << "_" << pulseID;
00203    std::string hist=histname.str();
00204    // replace all non c++ characters with underscore so we can use the
00205    // histograms in root directly.
00206    std::replace_if(hist.begin(),hist.end(), isNonCpp, '_');
00207    return hist;
00208 }

00210 int ExportPulse::PlotTPI(const TPulseIsland* pulse)const{
00211    
00212    std::string hist=GetTPIPlotName();
00213         
00214    std::stringstream title;
00215    title << "Pulse " << GetCurrentPulseID();
00216    title << " from event " << GetCurrentEventNumber();
00217    title << " on detector " << GetCurrentDetectorName();
00218    title << " (" << GetCurrentBankName()<<")";
00219 
00220    // Print some stuff if wanted
00221    if(Debug()){
00222         cout<<"Plotting pulse "<<GetCurrentPulseID()<<" for event "<<GetCurrentEventNumber();
00223         cout<<", detector '"<<GetCurrentDetectorName()<<"' ["<<hist<<"]"<<endl;
00224    }
00225 
00226    size_t num_samples = pulse->GetPulseLength();
00227    double max= ((pulse->GetTimeStamp() + num_samples) * fClockTick) - fTimeShift;
00228    double min= -fTimeShift;
00229    TH1F* hPulse = new TH1F(hist.c_str(), title.str().c_str(), num_samples,min,max);
00230    
00231    for ( size_t i=0;i <num_samples; ++i) {
00232      hPulse->SetBinContent(i+1, pulse->GetSamples().at(i));
00233    }
00234 
00235    return 0;
00236 }

00238 int ExportPulse::PlotTAP(const TAnalysedPulse* pulse)const{
00239   std::string hist=GetTPIPlotName();
00240   TH1F* tpi_hist=NULL;
00241   gDirectory->GetObject(hist.c_str(),tpi_hist);
00242   pulse->Draw(tpi_hist);
00243   return 0;
00244 }

00246 PulseIslandList* ExportPulse::GetTPIsFromDetector(std::string bank){
00247    if(bank=="") bank=this->GetCurrentBankName();
00248    return &fGlobalData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap[bank];
00249 }

00251 void ExportPulse::ShowGuidance(){
00252 // Only show guidance once
00253   if(fGuidanceShown) return;
00254   fGuidanceShown=true;
00255   cout<<"Requests to draw a pulse should be formatted as event(pulse),"<<endl;
00256   cout<<" where event and pulse are the numbers of each event and pulse you wish to draw"<<endl;
00257          //", a range (specified by A-Z, where A and Z are the first and last value of the range),"
00258          //" or a number of random events to select (specified by ~N where N is the number of events)";
00259 }

00261 bool ExportPulse::ParseEventRequest(std::string input, std::vector<EventID_t>& event_list){
00262         return ParseRequest(input,event_list,"event",0, GetTotalNumberOfEvents());
00263 }
00264 
00265 bool ExportPulse::ParsePulseRequest(std::string input, std::vector<EventID_t>& list){
00266         return ParseRequest(input,list,"pulse",0, GetTotalNumberOfEvents());
00267 }
00268 
00269 bool ExportPulse::ParseRequest(std::string input, std::vector<EventID_t>& list, const std::string& type, Long64_t lower_limit, Long64_t upper_limit){
00270         // Strip all whitespace
00271         modules::parser::RemoveWhitespace(input);
00272 
00273         // Check if input string contains a number,
00274         if(modules::parser::IsNumber(input)){
00275                 int event = modules::parser::GetNumber(input);
00276                 if (event >=lower_limit && event < upper_limit ){
00277                         list.push_back(event);
00278                 } else {
00279                         cout<<"Requested "<<type<<", "<<event<<" is out of range."<<endl;
00280                         cout<<"Acceptable values are: ["<<lower_limit<<","<<upper_limit<<"[."<<endl;
00281                         return false;
00282                 }
00283                 return true;
00284         }
00285         // Future Ideas:
00286         // Check if input contains a range,
00287         // Check if input contains a random request
00288         return false;
00289 }

00291 void ExportPulse::LoadPulsesRequestedByConfig(){
00292           // 7) In Process entry, invoke a method to check if there were requested or a pulse on a channel in this event
00293           //    and load them into fTPIsToPlot;
00294 
00295         for(EventChannelPulseIDs_t::iterator i_channel=fRequestedByConfig.begin();
00296                         i_channel!=fRequestedByConfig.end(); i_channel++){
00297                 EventPulseIDList_t::iterator i_event=i_channel->second.find(GetCurrentEventNumber());
00298                 if(i_event!=i_channel->second.end()){
00299                         for(PulseIDList_t::const_iterator i_pulse=i_event->second.begin();
00300                                         i_pulse!=i_event->second.end(); i_pulse++){
00301                                 AddToExportList(i_channel->first,*i_pulse);
00302                         }
00303                 }
00304         }
00305         
00306         // Check if all channels were requested
00307 }

00309 void ExportPulse::ClearPulsesToExport(){
00310   ChannelPulseIDs_t::iterator i_channel;
00311   for (i_channel=fTPIsToPlot.begin();i_channel!=fTPIsToPlot.end();i_channel++){
00312                   i_channel->second.clear();
00313   }
00314   fTPIsToPlot.clear();
00315   fTAPsToPlot.clear();
00316 }
